summary: While on a late night road trip home, a woman must save her rebellious teenage daughter who runs off with a bizarre group of blood-letting psychos.
cast: Madeleine Stowe|Norman Reedus|Bijou Phillips|Mischa Barton|Jonathan Rhys Meyers|Leo Gregory|Gary Parker|Amber Batty|Jenny Jules|Patrick O'Kane|Martin McDougall|Shauna Shim|David Menkin|Nigel Whitmey|Samuel Fröler|Stephen Lord|Dean Gregory|Sarah Drews|Raffaello Degruttola|Glenn Wrage|Monika Hudgins|Cesar Bayona Pinto|Véronique Koch|Ase Dunbar|Nicolette Christie|Rachel Pollack|Emma Drews|Tom Hunsinger|Sam Douglas|Pedro Barreira
keywords: gang of serial killers|vampire pack|nightmare|rest stop|pills
title: Octane: Rescate infernal
